Welcome to the Documentation


API Link: Click Here


Method Description
search Get student CGPI and Father's Name using this method    For e.g. https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/search?rollno=17mi526
OR    /search?rollno=17mi5% (Get the result of all the student who are studying in CSE-DD)
Method Description
result/{rollno} Get student full detail using Rollno All semesters result (with pointer in each individual subject)    For e.g. https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/17mi526
Method Description
result/{Rollno}/{Semester} Similar to above method, but returns result of a single semester only. If semester is invalid then body is empty.    For e.g. https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/17mi526/3
